post:
Dear members,

We're celebrating today our first anniversary for the MyW division which has proven to be a success (owned by WNDP - WebNegócio Lda, VAT PT513782540). 
We've achieved a consistent uptime during the year, with a few hundreds of clients and thousands of domains hosted among our servers.
While it hasn't been an easy ride, we're currently growing, profitable, and our NOC services (whitelabel support) proven to be a success as well. We're happy the way it is - small, profitable, easy to manage.

Some members here know that I and my girlfriend are expecting our first baby (21 weeks today!), so I've not only launched this promotion to celebrate our anniversary, as to fund a few acquisitions we need for our house to accommodate him - new couch, fridge, and other stuff that parents need. All the funds on this sale will be solely to improve our house. If you'd like to help, get one of these specials, which are all recurring.
Note: This thread was posted on LET, LES and HB.
(The DE server will be migrated to a Ryzen next Sunday!)

Coupons, first come first served:

**HIBOY** - 5 Coupons, Reseller Entry, paid annually for 40€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
**HAPPYDAY** - 5 Coupons, Reseller Advanced, paid annually for 80€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
**LILMIKE** - 10 Coupons, Shared Basic, paid annually for 20€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
**PRESIDENT** - 10 Coupons, Shared Pro, paid annually for 40€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
**CRAZYBASTARD** - 2 Coupons, Reseller Entry, paid annually for 30€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
**CRAZYMIKE** - 2 Coupons, Reseller Advanced, paid annually for 60€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
**COUCH** - 30 Coupons, Shared Basic, paid annually for 25€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
**FRIDGE** - 20 Coupons, Shared Basic, paid annually for 45€ - 1 per client (new or existing clients, can't be used to replace existing services)
